column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Loving this new spot! Wish we would have come for brunch
column2: my sister and I only got dessert there and it was to die for. Definitely worth the line we stood it. We just came at peak hour
column3: when we left there wasn't a line. I love the atmosphere of this place and how it allows you to look out to the streets and all the natural light. We sat on the patio
column4: the weather was perfect. Need to come back for the food ~!
